title: Introduction to Thermal Characterization Parameters
excerpt: In this article, we’ll discuss another group of thermal data, called thermal characterization parameters denoted by the Greek letter Psi (Ψ).

title: Junction-to-Case Thermal Resistance in Thermal Design
excerpt: Learn about an important thermal metric for designing the interface between an IC package and a heat sink.

title: Designing with a Heat Sink for Junction-to-Case Thermal Resistance
excerpt: Watch the thermal measurement, junction-to-case thermal resistance, in action as we use it to calculate the thermal considerations for a given system.

title: How Junction-to-Ambient Thermal Resistance of an IC Package Affects Thermal
excerpt: Assessing the thermal performance of an IC package becomes easier if you understand this common, but often misapplied, parameter known as theta JA.
